title: Rules for Their Protection
itunes:author: Guest: Kevin Leman
itunes:summary:
Rules are designed to keep your child safe. So, how do you respond when your son hates rules? John and Danny share how you can show your child respect, even when giving him rules. Featuring Dr. Kevin Leman and Jean Daly.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "Why Your Kids Misbehave--And What to Do About It" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-05-31?refcd=1430807

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/rules-for-their-protection/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/understanding-the-root-of-your-child-s-misbehavior-digital/?refcd=1430807

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
